key.name: enabled
key.summary: Share Public directory over the network
key.description: If this is true, the Public directory in the users home directory will be shared over the network when the user is logged in.

key.name: require-password
key.description: When to ask for passwords. Possible values are "never", "on_write", and "always".

key.name: bluetooth-enabled
key.description: If this is true, the Public directory in the users home directory will be shared over Bluetooth when the user is logged in.

key.name: bluetooth-allow-write
key.summary: Whether to allow Bluetooth clients to write files.
key.description: Whether to allow Bluetooth clients to write files, or share the files read-only.

key.name: bluetooth-require-pairing
key.summary: Whether Bluetooth clients need to pair with the computer to send files.
key.description: Whether Bluetooth clients need to pair with the computer to send files.

key.name: bluetooth-obexpush-enabled
key.summary: Whether Bluetooth clients can send files using ObexPush.
key.description: If this is true, Bluetooth devices can send files to the user's Downloads directory when logged in.

key.name: bluetooth-accept-files
key.summary: When to accept files sent over Bluetooth
key.description: When to accept files sent over Bluetooth. Possible values are "always", "bonded" and "ask".

key.name: bluetooth-notify
key.summary: Whether to notify about newly received files.
key.description: Whether to notify about newly received files.
